text: Louis "Chapa" Herrera (born May 3, 1996) is an American soccer player who plays as a midfielder for El Paso Locomotive in the USL Championship. ==References== Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:El Paso Locomotive FC players Category:USL Championship players Category:American soccer players Category:Association football midfielders Category:Soccer players from Texas Category:Sportspeople from El Paso, Texas
title: Chapa Herrera
